target.code:
def calculate_triangle_area(base, height):
    return (1 / 2) * base * height
target.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.
target.name: calculate_triangle_area

target.description: Calculate the area of a circle given its radius.
target.name: calculate_area_of_circle

target.code:
from sympy import sqrt

def calculate_lengths_of_altitudes(side_a, side_b, side_c):
    s = (side_a + side_b + side_c) / 2
    area = sqrt(s * (s - side_a) * (s - side_b) * (s - side_c))
    h_a = (2 * area) / side_a
    h_b = (2 * area) / side_b
    h_c = (2 * area) / side_c
    return sorted([h_a, h_b, h_c], reverse=True)[:2]
target.description: Calculate the lengths of the two longest altitudes in a triangle given its sides.
target.name: calculate_lengths_of_altitudes

target.description: Calculate the surface area of a frustum given its upper and lower radii and height.
target.name: calculate_surface_area_of_frustum
